normalized: yomihara, the land under tokyo, ruled by darkness.
today, the dwellers of darkness were excited about a big event.
the arena of darkness, the demons' arena, surged with depraved cheers.
finally, the climactic battle was to take place.
in the face of this battle, the other fights to take place this night were nothing but sideshows.
the spectators had been looking forward to the battle that much.
and then, the one who appeared amid the cheers, which even drowned out the excited announcer, was asagi.
the moment asagi entered, being led by oboro, the cheering changed to booing.
the taimanin organization had crumbled due to black's machinations, its village was controlled, and voices that desired a cruel end for asagi, who was now a prisoner, flew around.

name: oboro
normalized: ready?
will you die, or will asuka, who's like your daughter, die?
what will you do?

name: asagi
normalized: kuh…?!
asagi's expression contorted due to the words of oboro, who had whispered close to her ear.

name: oboro
normalized: the outcome is decided, then♪
while ridiculing asagi like that, oboro turned her gaze towards the spectators.
the reason that the dwellers of darkness were very excited was because of a card, which said that fellow taimanin were going to kill each other in this climactic battle.
immediately after, cheers arose again.

name: asagi
normalized: asuka…
from inside the west gate, asuka had come into view, in her taimanin outfit.
the instant her figure came under the spotlight, the cheering again changed to booing of a degree that rivalled asagi's.

name: asuka
normalized: ready?
if you do anything strange, i'll kill you without mercy.

name: takuto
normalized: i, i know!
i'll cooperate with anything, so please don't kill me!
a secret conversation, known only to the pair of them.
during that, takuto's cold sweat did not stop.
it was understandable.
asuka had turned his older brother, ryouji― and, of course, all of their self-proclaimed gang―into lumps of meat.
takuto no longer had the slightest bit of intent to harm asuka, who had flaunted that in front of his eyes.
in addition, certain “devices” had now been given to takuto to prevent his escape.

name: takuto
normalized: h, hey, you'll remove them when this is over, right?
takuto shivered as he looked at his groin.

name: asuka
normalized: that's up to you.
hey, toughen up.
you're a man, aren't you?

name: takuto
normalized: th, that's… right, but…
leaving the furtive takuto behind, asuka got up on the arena, and faced off against asagi.
oboro stepped toward asuka.

name: oboro
normalized: feel free to kill asagi.
she's ready as well♪

name: oboro
normalized: are you looking forward to it?
it seemed she thought that asuka was also prepared for it.
oboro smirked as she left the arena.

name: black
normalized: now… it's time for this evening's main event.
and then, when black's arm, which had been raised overhead, was brought down, the curtain opened on the climactic battle between asagi and asuka.
cheers and jeers broke out immediately after.
for the audience, it was a natural reaction, since no matter which one dropped dead, asagi or asuka, it would be cause for delight.

name: asagi
normalized: kuh!
during that, asagi was wavering, even though she had reached this stage.
she was not afraid to die.
however, there was no guarantee that asuka would leave here safely afterwards.
nor of the well-being of kousuke, sakura and murasaki.

name: asagi
normalized: …shit.
the matters she was burdened with were great and many, and the movement of asagi, who couldn't abandon them completely, became sluggish whether she wanted it to or not.

name: asuka
normalized: haa!
asuka dominated asagi's field of vision instantly.

name: asagi
normalized: kuh!
she had just barely managed to defend against asuka's blade, but asagi, who had no choice but to make it a one-sided defensive battle, had no better cards to play.

name: asagi
normalized: （as things stand…）
and then, the instant something cold ran through asagi's spine.

name: asuka
normalized: asagi-san… let's destroy black together.

name: asagi
normalized: eh?
at the moment their blades clashed, asagi had heard a voice so small that it was audible only to her.

name: asagi
normalized: asuka?

name: asuka
normalized: taah!
once again, the sound of hard metal clashing.

name: asuka
normalized: i'm fine.
kousuke too… i've retrieved kousuke safely.
while making their swords clash against each other so loudly that it didn't leak out to the audience, not to mention oboro and black――

name: asuka
normalized: i've heard that sakura-nee and murasaki-san are alive, and confined somewhere.
she condensed and communicated information in brief.

name: asagi
normalized: hmm…
and then, asagi, who had understood asuka's intentions after they clashed a few times, faintly smiled.

name: asagi
normalized: you've grown up, asuka…
asagi gazed at the maturity of the girl she thought of as her daughter like she was looking at something blindingly bright.
however, her expression suddenly clouded over.

name: asagi
normalized: kill me.
i…
asagi had been engraved with a hypnotic seal by oboro, and couldn't go against it.

name: asagi
normalized: kill me.
it's all right.
you could lead the taimanin.
there was a person she could entrust the rest to.
when she felt that, the hesitation she had been experiencing until just now miraculously disappeared.

name: asagi
normalized: now, quickly.
and then, at the moment that asagi had prepared herself.

name: asuka
normalized: that's okay.
as they clashed, asuka grinned.

name: asuka
normalized: i heard that you're marked with a hypnotic seal.
but what about this?

name: asagi
normalized: …eh?
suddenly, asuka's eyes parted from asagi.

name: takuto
normalized: eh?
the one her eyes had turned toward was takuto, who stood next to oboro, who was enjoying the battle between asuka and asagi from the side of the arena.

name: asuka
normalized: i got you to move next to that person, as you were told.
you were useful in the end, weren't you?
for a moment during the course of that, her eyes met with the puzzled oboro.

name: asuka
normalized: （oboro-san, the reflection that continues to damage your honour will be eliminated by my hand.
and then, her eyes met with takuto.

name: takuto
normalized: o, oi?!
you promised, right?!
s, stop, forgi――

name: asuka
normalized: annihilation missile, break.
she lightly snapped her fingers.
dogaann!
immediately after, takuto's body blew apart.
together with the four annihilation missiles that had been attached to his body.

name: oboro
normalized: なっ？
the tremendous blast and explosive flame also engulfed oboro, who was next to takuto.
no scream was heard.
the explosion, which even a vampire couldn't withstand, had blasted oboro's body and burned it to nothing instantly.
without even knowing what had happened, oboro had met her third―and this time, actual―death.
for oboro―for the false life who had continued to torment asagi, it was too quick a death.

name: asuka
normalized: with this, the details are no problem.
her hair being swayed by the blast, asuka smiled fearlessly.
quite a number of spectators had been swallowed up by the explosion, and panic was already starting to set in, but she didn't even pay attention to that.
the obstacle had disappeared.
that was all that was important.

name: asagi
normalized: you really have grown up, haven't you?

name: asuka
normalized: that's because i hate you.

name: asagi
normalized: hmph.
asagi nodded, seeming satisfied.
the person before her eyes was no longer her daughter.
she was a taimanin.
asagi turned her eyes toward the top of the demons' arena.

name: black
normalized: ho…
there was the ruler of darkness.
and her mortal enemy.

name: asuka
normalized: black can't be brought down by anyone but you.
the “goddess of death”.

name: asagi
normalized: yeah.
black can't be defeated by anyone but us.

name: asuka
normalized: yeah!
and “the strongest”.
a declaration of war from the two taimanin.

name: black
normalized: fine.
i will accept the challenge.
black smiled, like it made for a good side show or something, and stepped forward in front of asagi and asuka, who had started running towards him.
the arena was in chaos.
now, at last, the final battle began.
